General.Name: Dynapack International Technology
General.Description: Dynapack International Technology Corporation develops battery related technologies in Taiwan. The company offers notebook, tablet PC, mobile phone, medical product, and industry PDA battery pack, as well as robot vacuum cleaner, power bank, and wireless charging battery pack. It also provides energy storage system, battery backup unit, and uninterruptible power system. In addition, the company offers E-bike, E-scooter, rail guided vehicle/ automated guided vehicle, and electric tricycle. The company was formerly known as Hwa-Dah International Technology Corporation and changed its name to Dynapack International Technology Corporation in June 2002. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 188, Wenhe Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333
